summary: Various Chests with  item sets, mix and match! Use to get a leg up or to explore different areas of the game.
descriptionHtml:
On your 2nd or third time around and kind of sick of gathering gear? Maybe these are \"heirlooms\" from your last toon...
The Alchemy chest allows you to (perhaps) explore a facet you\'ve never fully tried. The caster chest gives access to all spells, giving you a chance to try new stuff out.

[b]Any suggestions welcome[/b]

Each addon adds a chest next to Jorrvaskr in Whiterun. [b]Chests can all be loaded concurrently, or just mix n\' match.[/b] 
[list]
[*]Alchemy
[*]Caster
[*]Daedric
[*]Dragonplate
[*]Dragonscale
[*]Dwarven
[*]Ebony
[*]Elven
[*]Falmer
[*]Forsworn
[*]Glass
[*]Iron
[*]Leather
[*]Orcish
[*]Stormcloak Bear
[/list]
All come with the same amount of \"starter gold\" (65365 gp).
[list]
[*]Full Armor
[*]Bow
[*]Arrows
[*]Battle Axe, Greatsword, War Hammer
[*]Sword, Mace, Dagger, War Axe
[/list]
Enchanted items are usually Soul Steal, Sneak, Two (or One)-handed increase and Marksman.
[b]File list and explanations[/b]
CheatChestAlchemy.esp - Alchemy Ingredients and boost gear.
CheatChestCasterEnch.esp - Enchanted caster gear. Magika specific. All Spellbooks.
CheatChestDaedric.esp - Non-magical Daedric gear.
CheatChestDaedricEnch.esp - Magical Daedric gear.
CheatChestDragonplate.esp - Non-magical Dragonplate armor.
CheatChestDragonplateEnch.esp - Magical Dragonplate armor.
CheatChestDragonscale.esp - Non-magical Dragonscale armor.
CheatChestDwarven.esp - Non-magical Dwarven gear.
CheatChestEbony.esp - Non-magical Ebony gear.
CheatChestEbonyEnch.esp - Magical Ebony gear.
CheatChestElven.esp - Non-magical Elven gear.
CheatChestElvenEnch.esp - Magical Elven gear.
CheatChestFalmer.esp - Non-magical Falmer gear.
CheatChestForsworn.esp - Non-magical Forsworn gear.
CheatChestGlassEnch.esp - Magical Glass gear
CheatChestIron.esp - Non-magical Iron gear.
CheatChestLeather.esp - Non-magical Leather armor.
CheatChestOrcish.esp - Non-magical Orcish armor.
CheatChestStormcloakBear.esp - Non-magical Stormcloak Bear armor.
author: rigamonk
